var.dsc: Verify the MySQL Server Disk Use in Bytes Changed when Import database and delete database

recm.val: MySQL Server Disk Use in Bytes
mysql -E -e "use test01;Drop table testtb;";mysql -E -e "create database test01";mysql -E -e "use test01;create table testtb(pid int,name varchar(20));Insert into testtb values(1,"01");"
mysqldump -u root --password=OpsMgr2007R2 test01>/tmp/test.sql;mysql -E -e "use test01;Drop table testtb;Drop database test01;"
mysql -E -e "use test01;Drop table testtb;Drop database test01;"
